items.title: Squash some bugs
items.notes:
Double clicking open item in list causes side-bar to disappear; fixed by clicking again.

Hidden scrollbar is buggy. Might be caused by 'hacking' horizontal scroll and therefore could be fixed by carousel implimentation.

When adding new list, page jumps to odd position. Possibly fixed when carousel is implimented.

Gotta work on that carousel.

items.title: Add carousel effect
items.notes: For mice that can't scroll horizontally & touchscreen devices.

items.title: Impliment file editing
items.notes: Allowing lists to be updated to reflect visible changes.

items.title: Add ability to work locally
items.notes: Latest update uses AJAX to call .json file; XMLHttpRequest's throw security errors when local file access is attempted.

items.title: Tidy everything up
items.notes:
Fade lists in to prevent scrollbar flash.
Fix .main-container width to adjust to number of lists.
